Articles.Content:
The landing leg when I land a vessel with the speed of less than 5m/s and when I touchdown the landing leg literally disappear without overstressing message or destroyed particle.

The version I tried is 1.4.3 with the DLC (I tried building Falcon 9)

 

PS I tried it on my friend computer because I didn't own it but I am thinking about buying the game
What landing legs do u use? What are the computer specs? Any screenshots of the craft?
